item.title: Why You Need Dedicated Bandwidth
item.description: It’s easy to assume all high-speed internet connections are equal, but this isn’t true. Unfortunately, businesses may only discover this reality after missing out on sales and losing valuable customers. While the core of the internet is quite reliable, with issues like packet loss, latency, and bandwidth rarely impacting crucial applications, the most significant difference between internet services lies in the “last mile” connection â€“ the link between your router and the provider.
